metadata.title: CVE-2022-0547 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenVPN 2.1 until v2.4.12 and v2.5.6 may enable authentication bypass inexternal authentication plug-ins when more than one of them makes use ofdeferred authentication replies, which allows an external user to begranted access with only partially correct credentials.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0547` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.5.5-1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.5-1ubuntu3').
